## Bcp47.ValidateTag.validateSubtags() method

Validates supplied [subtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtags.md) to a requested [validity level](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.tagvalidity.md)<!-- -->, if necessary.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static validateSubtags(subtags: ISubtags, wantValidity: TagValidity, haveValidity?: TagValidity): Result<boolean>;
```

Result&lt;boolean&gt;
